title: Scandinavia: the Next Big Thing in Tourism Industry: EnjoyScandinavia.com
text: Receive press releases from Enjoyscandinavia.com: By Email RSS Feeds: Scandinavia: the Next Big Thing in Tourism Industry: EnjoyScandinavia.com Scandinavian countries: Sweden, Finland, Norway, Denmark and Iceland are turning out to be the next big travel destination especially during the summer holidays. New York, NY, July 30, 2015 --( PR.com )-- If anyone has just booked or is planning to book summer holidays then hold on as travel deals and packages to Scandinavia are the flavor of the season. There are tours available online that are simply irresistible and on top of everything, they can be customized to suit individual needs.Explore the major countries: Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, Iceland and experience exciting views, great landscapes, beautiful buildings, special cruises, great night life and even nice parks.There was a time when Scandinavia was one of the most expensive places to visit. Scandinavia, comprising of the countries of Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark and Iceland is still expensive yet there are ways to make sure that one's holiday is not exactly taxing on the pocket.This is particularly due to the fact that they have maintained really high standards and generally don't compromise on the quality of life. But it is the place to be in these times as it is becoming a hot spot for all the travelers of the world.According to the Director, Sales and Marketing at the website, Scandinavia is being touted as the next big thing in the tourism industry especially for the summer Holidays comprising of Scandinavian countries of Sweden, Finland, Norway, Denmark and Iceland.Keep in mind when planning the Scandinavian tour that peak season is April to August as it is their summer season although one can visit best of travel destinations in Scandinavia at any time of the year. Visit the major cities of Scandinavia and experience great shopping, food and entertainment with natural surrounds and cosmopolitan fun. Just try Scandinavia and enjoy the best summer holidays.
